summary: What happens when veterans can't get enough food or aren’t sure when they'll get their next meal? In 2016, the Department of Veterans Affairs started trying to find these veterans and refer them for assistance. VA uses a screening tool to identify such veterans and refer them to food banks and other services and resources. In 2020, VA began collaborating with the Department of Agriculture...
title: Nutrition Assistance Programs: Federal Agencies Should Improve Oversight and Better Collaborate on Efforts to Support Veterans with Food Insecurity
